properties.name: rpc.client.loadbalance
properties.description: Load balancing algorithm, candidate values include: (random, roundRobin, consistentHash), the default is random.

properties.name: rpc.client.registry
properties.description: Registration center, such as (zookeeper, nacos, etc.), defaults to: zookeeper

properties.name: rpc.client.registry-addr
properties.description: Service discovery (registry) address. The default is "127.0.0.1:2181"

properties.name: rpc.client.serialization
properties.description: Serialization algorithm, candidate values include: (JDK, JSON, HESSIAN, KRYO, PROTOSTUFF), default: HESSIAN

properties.name: rpc.client.transport
properties.description: Communication protocols, such as netty and http, are netty by default
